scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run -s serve || npm run -s dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && preact build --production --prerender --prerenderUrls src/prerender-urls.json --template src/template.html && cp src/assets/favicon.ico build && mv build/* . && rmdir build
scripts.clean: find . -not -name CNAME -not -name src -not -name package.json -not -name node_modules -not -name . -not -name .. -not -name .git -not -name .gitignore -maxdepth 1 -print0 | xargs -0 rm -rf
scripts.serve: npm run build && rmdir build && preact serve --dir .
